alert.note: Alert for Hoke; Moore (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 3:42PM EDT until July 01 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Moore County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Hoke County in central North Carolina... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 341 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pinehurst, or near Southern Pines, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southern Pines, Carthage, Pinehurst, Aberdeen, Whispering Pines, Pinebluff, Foxfire, Taylortown, Vass and Seven Lakes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
